scripts.install:local: mv .npmrc .npmrc.bak || true && unset npm_config_prefix && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm exec 22 npm install --build-from-source --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 && mv .npmrc.bak .npmrc || true
scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/assets/fonts && cp assets/fonts/LXGWWenKaiMonoTC-Regular.ttf dist/assets/fonts/ && cp assets/fonts/NotoColorEmoji-Regular.ttf dist/assets/fonts/ && cp themes.json dist/ && cp styles.json dist/
scripts.dev: mv .npmrc .npmrc.bak || true && unset npm_config_prefix && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm exec 22 env NODE_ENV=development npm_config_platform=darwin npm_config_arch=arm64 nodemon api/index.ts && mv .npmrc.bak .npmrc || true
